sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

effects.display_string: Set: Shield of the Righteous deals 10% increased damage and grants 3% damage reduction.
Set: Casting a Holy Power ability increases the damage and healing you deal during your next Avenging Wrath by 0.5%. This effect stacks.

spells.description:
Equip: Advance to the 50 Verses of Inner Resilience, reading as you are attacked.
Inner Resilience increases your armor by 3,396 and grants your attacks a chance to invoke a ward which absorbs 891,632 Magic damage. When finished, sift through the passages to another chapter.
Use: Sift through the passages in the tome with increased Radiance. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Use: Become Mudborne, absorbing 8 million damage and pulsing 398,508 Nature damage split between nearby enemies over 10 sec.

Periodic damage you take coalesces into pungent mud to feed the ritual, reducing this cooldown by 2.0 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)
Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 66,880 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.
Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 66,880 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.
